title: Moving pictures show girl, five, caring for BOTH grandmas after mum 'abandoned her' and dad was jailed
text:
News Moving pictures show girl, five, caring for BOTH grandmas after mum 'abandoned her' and dad was jailed Wang Anna spends her days cooking, cleaning and taking care of her beloved gran and great-gran - despite being only five years old Share Wang Anna cooks a meal for her gran and great-gran (Photo: Rex Features) Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
Standing on a stool, little Wang Anna concentrates as she cooks vegetables for her beloved gran and great-gran. 
Despite being only five, the youngster spends her days making meals, cleaning and caring for her two elderly relatives. 
She started looking after the frail pair at a remote house in China after her mum remarried and allegedly abandoned her. 
Her dad had been imprisoned when she was a baby , so when her mother wed again, she was left alone with her gran and great-gran. The youngster spends her days caring for her two elderly relatives (Photo: Rex Features) She started looking after the frail pair after her mum remarried and allegedly abandoned her (Photo: Rex Features) She reportedly wakes up early every morning to prepare meals and clean the house (Photo: Rex Features) Read More Kind-hearted traffic warden leaves heartwarming note tucked in penalty notice on woman's car 
Now, she reportedly wakes up early every morning to prepare meals for her relatives in their house in a mountainous village in Zhima town, Zunyi city. 
She visits their neighbour's farm to pick fresh vegetables, which she then cooks on a stove that she can barely reach with her small arms. 
In heartbreaking pictures, she can be seen feeding her gran and great-gran with chopsticks, washing them and cleaning their home. The family live in a mountainous village in Zhima town in China (Photo: Rex Features) The kind-hearted five-year-old is pictured washing one of her relative's feet (Photo: Rex Features) Wang Anna's dad was imprisoned for unspecified reasons when she was three months old, it is reported (Photo: Rex Features) Read More Protect your children against high blood pressure by eating leafy green vegetables when you're pregnant 
She also helps them to go to the bathroom on a daily basis. 
Both of the elderly women are nearly bedridden at the property in southwest China's Guizhou province, MailOnline reports. 
Wang Anna's grandmother has severe arthritis while her great-gran is 92 years old, according to a reporter who visited the family. The little girl apparently does not complain as she cares for her relatives (Photo: Rex Features) It is not clear whether she has support from elsewhere (Photo: Rex Features) Wang Anna's grandmother has severe arthritis while her great-gran is 92 years old (Photo: Rex Features) 
Despite her age, the little girl apparently does not complain as she cares for her relatives. It is not clear whether she has support from elsewhere. 
Wang Anna's dad was imprisoned for unspecified reasons when she was just three months old, it is reported. Her mum later remarried. Like us on Facebook
